message.name: ERR_CREATE_APPEAL_CASE_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the Appellant for a newly created Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_APPEAL_CASE_DUPLICATE_THIRDPARTY
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the Third Party for a newly created Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_APPEAL_CASE_DUPLICATE_WITNESS
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the Witness for a Hearing.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_APPEAL_CASE_DUPLICATE_REPRESENTATIVE
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as the Representative for a Hearing.
